title.value: Применение микроудобрений для предпосевной инкрустации семян озимых зерновых культур

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Privalov, F.I., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the influence of mono- and complex micro fertilizers, included in protective-stimulating compositions on yield elements and yield of winter cereal crops. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research it was revealed that use of complex compositions was more preferable. Seed pre-treatment of winter grain crops by micro fertilizers was an effective technique to increase grain yield and profit. Most responsive to the processing of seed crops by trace elements was winter wheat (Triticum aestivum). Less effective was the inclusion of trace elements in the protective-stimulating mixture with inlays seeds of winter rye (Secale cereale). Among the micronutrients most effective for all crops identified at inclusion in a protective-stimulating mixture Adob Cu and Adob Mn. Gisinar-M provided the highest efficiency when included in the protective-stimulating mixture compared with fertilizers Sejbit PZ, Helkom P4 and Basfoliar 34.
